perturbation.original_text:
2. Period of transportation services: this Agreement is valid for an indefinite term. Subsequent contracts might be entered in case of special
business.
perturbation.changed_text:
2. Period of transportation services: this Agreement is valid for an indefinite term. This agreement will automatically terminate after one year unless both parties agree to renew it in writing. Subsequent contracts might be entered in case of special
business.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the agreement is for an indefinite term. The changed text introduces a contradiction by stating it automatically terminates after one year unless renewed. This creates uncertainty about the agreement's duration.

perturbation.original_text:
5. In order to guarantee rapid transfer of Party A’s parcel, Party B shall strictly comply with the following obligations:

(a) During the transportation, Part B shall completely comply with Party A’s transportation arrangement and relevant systems. Party B shall
bear any consequences and legal liability arising out of Party B’s non-compliance, and Party A shall have no liability. Party A has
the right to terminate this Agreement without further legal liability in the case that Party B does not comply with Party A’s
management and arrangement.
perturbation.changed_text:
5. In order to guarantee rapid transfer of Party A’s parcel, Party B shall strictly comply with the following obligations:

(a) During the transportation, Part B shall completely comply with Party A’s transportation arrangement and relevant systems. Party B shall
bear any consequences and legal liability arising out of Party B’s non-compliance, and Party A shall have no liability. Party A will not be able to terminate this agreement even if Party B does not comply with Party A's management and arrangement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text gives Party A the right to terminate the agreement if Party B doesn't comply with their arrangements. The modified text removes this right, stating Party A cannot terminate the agreement for non-compliance. This direct contradiction creates confusion about Party A's termination rights.

perturbation.original_text: 15. Any different interpretation of this Agreement by both Parties is subject to final interpretation by Party A.
perturbation.changed_text: 15. Any different interpretation of this Agreement by both Parties is subject to joint final interpretation by both Party A and Party B. Should they not reach an agreement in their joint interpretation, it will be subject to the jurisdiction of the People’s Court where this Agreement is signed.
perturbation.explanation: The original text gives Party A the sole power to interpret the agreement. The modified text mandates joint interpretation by both parties, and resort to court jurisdiction if they disagree. This contradicts the original unilateral power of Party A to interpret the agreement, leading to uncertainty about how disputes will be resolved.
